definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: curse, c. acc., usu. pers.: Pf. 3 ms. sf. [[קַכּׂה]] (Ges:§ 58 d) Nu 23:8; 2 ms. sf. consec. [[וְקַכּׂתוֹ]] v:Nu 23:27; Impf. 3 ms. [[וַיִּקּׂב]] (Ges:§ 67 g) Le 24:11 (c. acc. [[אֶת־הַשֵּׁם]]); 2 ms. sf. [[תִּקֳּבֶנּוּ]] Nu 23:25 (+ Inf. abs.); 1 s. [[אֶקּׂב]] v:Nu 23:8 (obj. om.); [[וׇאֶקּוֹב נׇוֵהוּ]] Job 5:3 (prob. corrupt; LXX Du rd. [[וַיִּדְקַב]], cf. Me Bi Siegf Beer; [[וַיִּפָּקֵד]] Bu; [[וַיוּקַב]] Che:JQ July, 1897, 575; [[וַיִּבּׂק]] Bev:JPhil, xxvi. 308 (cf. Is 24:1, Is 24:3, Je 51:2, Na 2:3)); 3 mpl. sf. [[יִקְּבֻהוּ]] Job 3:8, Pr 11:26, Pr 24:24; Imv. ms. [[קָֽבָה־לִּי]] (Ges:§ 67 p Kö:i. 329 ff.) Nu 22:11, Nu 22:17, sf. 3 ms. [[וְקָבְנרׁלִי]] (Ges:§ 67 o) Nu 23:13 (all JE; all + [[לִי]] as dat. comm.., so also v:Nu 23:27 vid. Pf. supr.); Inf. abs. [[קׂב]] v:Nu 23:25 (+ Impf.); Inf. cstr. [[לָקׂב]] v:Nu 23:11, Nu 24:10.
